'''法泉雅'''是日本的《[[eXceed]]》系列弹幕游戏及其衍生作品的登场角色之一。

==简介==
《[[eXceed-GUN BULLET CHILDREN-]]》，《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]》及《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE REX-]]》的登场角色。



==事迹==

《[[eXceed-GUN BULLET CHILDREN-]]》中的三自机之一，《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]》及《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE REX-]]》 中的四面BOSS。<ref>[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/EXceed]</ref>

===[[eXceed-GUN BULLET CHILDREN-]]===

{{Hide
|标题=英文原文
|内容=
Miyabe is very childlike in her attitude and behavior. She was inducted into the Gun Bullet Children program after being raised an orphan by the Church. Nothing is known about her history prior to joining the church.
Enemies that enter the range of her ability ‘Incinerating Kiss’ are instantly reduced to ashes.<ref>[http://exceedseries.com/exceed-gbc_main/chrs_gb]</ref>
}}
法泉雅在她的态度和行为上都很小孩子气。在被就会作为孤儿抚养后作为枪弹少女（Gun Bullet Children ）培养，没人知道她进入教会前的历史。
敌人只要进入她的能力“焚化之吻”（Incinerating Kiss）的范围都会迅速变为灰烬。

===[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]===

{{Hide
|标题=英文原文
|内容=
Accompanies Chinatsu and the Church’s Gun Bullet Children in their missions.
Her true nature is a mystery, but she has a happy-go-lucky attitude, however desperate the situation.
Miyabi wields the incendiary art of ‘Incinerating Kiss’.
<ref>[http://exceedseries.com/2nd-vampire-rex/chrs_2vr]</ref>
}}
陪伴千夏和教会的枪弹少女（Gun Bullet Children ）完成他们的任务。
她的真面目是个谜，但她有着轻松愉快的态度，然而除了这种状况。法泉雅掌握着焚化术“焚化之吻”（Incinerating Kiss）

==她的弹幕==
===[[eXceed-GUN BULLET CHILDREN-]]===
'''メルトインブレイス'''（Melt in breath）呼吸中熔化

===[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]===
